actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase certain fees paid by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs for reports and certifications submitted by educational institutions and joint apprenticeship training committees.

summary.text: Increases specified fees paid by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs for reports and certifications submitted by educational institutions and joint apprenticeship training committees. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1784)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase certain fees paid by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs for reports and certifications submitted by educational institutions and joint apprenticeship training committees.
